Locations.name: John Hancock Center
Locations.description: Enter from North Michigan Avenue at the lower level. Go down the hall past The Cheesecake Factory and turn right at the shoeshine shop. The restrooms will be down the hall on the left.

Locations.name: The Shops at North Bridge
Locations.description: Enter from North Michigan Avenue. Take a left past the stores to the escalator and take the escalator to the second floor. The restrooms are located to the left. There is also an elevator located just past the escalators, to the left.

Locations.name: Chicago Riverwalk
Locations.description: These restrooms are located on the Chicago Riverwalk between North State Street and North Dearborn Street.

Locations.name: Chicago Riverwalk
Locations.description: These restrooms are located on the Chicago Riverwalk between North Dearborn Street and North Clark Street.

Locations.name: Chicago Riverwalk
Locations.description: These restrooms are located on the Chicago Riverwalk between North LaSalle Street and North Wells Street.

Locations.name: James R. Thompson Center
Locations.description: Enter at the West Randolph Street and North Clark Street corner doors. Take the escalator down to the food court and take a right out of the food court area to the restrooms.

Locations.name: Block 37
Locations.description: Enter at the North State Street entrance. Walk down the hall to the center area of the mall. Take the escalator down to the lower level and turn left down the hall at the bottom of the escalator. The restrooms will be on the left. These are the best restrooms to use in this mall because there are more stalls. The restrooms on the upper floors of the mall are smaller restrooms with only a few stalls.

Locations.name: Chicago Cultural Center
Locations.description: Enter at either the East Washington Street or East Randolph Street entrance. The restrooms are on the north (East Randolph Street) end of the building.

Locations.name: Jay Pritzker Pavilion at Millennium Park
Locations.description: This restroom location is open seasonally. The restrooms are located to the east and west of the stage.

Locations.name: Harold Washington Library Center
Locations.description: Restrooms are located on several floors of the library.

Locations.name: Grant Park Near Buckingham Fountain
Locations.description:
This restroom is located in Grant Park to the northwest of Buckingham Fountain, 301 South Columbus Drive, Chicago.

This restroom location is open seasonally. It is currently open for the 2017 season.

Learn more about Buckingham Fountain at http://www.chicagoparkdistrict.com/parks/clarence-f-buckingham-memorial-fountain/

Locations.name: Grant Park Near Buckingham Fountain
Locations.description:
This restroom is located in Grant Park to the southwest of Buckingham Fountain, 301 South Columbus Drive, Chicago.

This restroom location is open seasonally. It is currently open for the 2017 season.

Learn more about Buckingham Fountain at http://www.chicagoparkdistrict.com/parks/clarence-f-buckingham-memorial-fountain/
